item.description: Trailhead: I93 north to exit 34B,make left go under I93,make left onto I93 south.Exit I93 at Lafayette Campground,make left into south end of the hiker parking lot.We will hike the Lonesome Lake,Hi-Cannon and Kinsman Ridge Trails to the summit of Cannon Mountain (4100').Good views of Lonesome Lake,Lafayette and Lincoln. 5.6 miles round trip,8 hours hours estimated time.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: STRENUOUS HIKE-CANNON MOUNTAIN
